___total_filtered.description: The total number of resources in the filtered collection.
___total_filtered.title: Total Filtered

___current_page.description: The current page of the filtered collection that this resource represents.
___current_page.title: Current Page

___total_pages.description: The total number of pages (i.e. sized partitions) in the filtered collection.
___total_pages.title: Total Pages

___total.description: The total number of resources in this collection.
___total.title: Total

___current_page_size.description: The number of resources in the current page of the filtered collection.
___current_page_size.title: Current Page Size
